name: news
description: Latest headlines from trusted RSS feeds. No API key. Use when the user asks for news, headlines, or what's happening in the world.

tools.name: news_headlines
tools.description: Get latest news headlines. Use when the user asks for 'latest news', 'headlines', 'what's in the news', or 'news today'. Returns title, link, and source for each story.

limit.description: Max number of headlines to return (default 10, max 25)

source.description: Preferred feed: bbc, npr, reuters, or all (default: all, merges and dedupes by title)
